info.name: Darken Gmail - 2018 Dark Theme
info.description:
A Dark theme for the new 2018 Gmail design that was built from the ground up to actually make everything dark (not just the background and buttons) and keep the amazing background picture you chose visible :)

Please rate and give feedback, I want to make this (at least one of) the best Gmail (2018) theme(s)!

Customization will come in a future update once I get the code a bit more organized.

Thanks!
info.additionalInfo:
// IMPORTANT NOTES \\

** You will need to have your text background set to Dark in the Gmail theme settings (custom theme) **

** In order to style the Hangouts section of Gmail you currently will need a separate style. ** 
- Currently I use this one and have no problems with it so far: https://userstyles.org/styles/151852/google-hangouts-dark-style-fixes 

// Release Notes \\

** Version 1.0.1 ** - Fixed an issue with text becoming unreadable when composing via the compose button plus a few other little tweaks :)

** Version 1.0 ** - I think I have all my bases covered but if I missed a bright drop-down or section please let me know!
